attributes.action: Repeat the EU referendum & force the Leave campaign to apologise for lying
attributes.background: The Leave campaign has lied to the British people about the implications for exit. To avoid years of social and economic pain in the UK and in Europe, we must reconsider the vote to leave. The Leave campaign must be forced to declare its lies, and the real implications of leaving and then we revote

rejection.details:
We already have a petition calling for a second referendum:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/133753

The Government and Parliament don't have the power to force the Leave campaign to apologise.
